name: MIS Financial Transfers Between Accounts
description:
Shows all transfers between spends, private cash and savings accounts on a specified date for a given caseload.
FIN0014 - v00.00.05

dataset.name: Transfers
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT * AS DEBIT_ACCOUNT_NAME FROM (SELECT AT_TFR_DR_ACCOUNT_CODE.ACCOUNT_NAME, AT_TFR_CR_ACCOUNT_CODE.ACCOUNT_NAME, SUM(AT_FACT_OFF_TFR_OUT.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFF_TFR_OUT, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFF_TFR_IN, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_TFR_DR_ACCOUNT_CODE, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_TFR_CR_ACCOUNT_CODE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_TFR_TXN_DATE WHERE (AT_FACT_OFF_TFR_OUT.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_TFR_DR_ACCOUNT_CODE.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_TFR_TXN_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_TFR_OUT.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_TFR_IN.TXN_ID = AT_FACT_OFF_TFR_OUT.TXN_ID) AND (AT_TFR_CR_ACCOUNT_CODE.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_TFR_IN.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_TFR_OUT.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_TFR_IN.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_TFR_IN.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK = 1) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_TFR_OUT.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK = 2) AND ((AT_FACT_OFF_TFR_OUT.CASELOAD_ID = (SELECT CASELOAD_ID FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter Caseload ID','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,constrained,Not_Persistent,User:69) */)) AND ((SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter Transfer Date','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:159) */) = AT_TFR_TXN_DATE.DAY_DATE)) GROUP BY AT_TFR_DR_ACCOUNT_CODE.ACCOUNT_NAME, AT_TFR_CR_ACCOUNT_CODE.ACCOUNT_NAME) _query0 FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT AT_TFR_DR_ACCOUNT_CODE.ACCOUNT_NAME, AT_TFR_CR_ACCOUNT_CODE.ACCOUNT_NAME, SUM(AT_FACT_OFF_TFR_IN.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFF_TFR_IN, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFF_TFR_OUT, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_TFR_DR_ACCOUNT_CODE, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_TFR_CR_ACCOUNT_CODE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_TFR_TXN_DATE WHERE (AT_FACT_OFF_TFR_OUT.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_TFR_DR_ACCOUNT_CODE.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_TFR_TXN_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_TFR_OUT.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_TFR_IN.TXN_ID = AT_FACT_OFF_TFR_OUT.TXN_ID) AND (AT_TFR_CR_ACCOUNT_CODE.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_TFR_IN.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_TFR_OUT.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_TFR_IN.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_TFR_IN.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK = 1) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_TFR_OUT.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK = 2) AND ((AT_FACT_OFF_TFR_OUT.CASELOAD_ID = (SELECT CASELOAD_ID FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter Caseload ID','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,constrained,Not_Persistent,User:69) */)) AND ((SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter Transfer Date','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:159) */) = AT_TFR_TXN_DATE.DAY_DATE)) GROUP BY AT_TFR_DR_ACCOUNT_CODE.ACCOUNT_NAME, AT_TFR_CR_ACCOUNT_CODE.ACCOUNT_NAME) _query1 ON _query0.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = _query1.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY), dataset_ AS (SELECT DEBIT_ACCOUNT_NAME FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT TRUNC(BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_END_DATETIME) AS LOAD_END_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT LOAD_END_DATE FROM dataset_base_)
